alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Henderson; Henry; Mercer; Putnam; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 3:00PM CST until January 23 at 9:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Illinois and southeast Iowa. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact Tuesday morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain is expected to transition to rain late tonight into Tuesday morning as temperatures gradually warm.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bureau; Henderson; Henry; Mercer; Putnam; Warren
